definition: a room used primarily for sleeping, to place in an enclose area or chamber
details:
noun
- a room used primarily for sleeping
= synonyms: bedroom
- a natural or artificial enclosed space
- a room where a judge transacts business
- an enclosed volume in the body
= example: an enclosed volume in the body
- a deliberative or legislative or administrative or judicial assembly
= example: a deliberative or legislative or administrative or judicial assembly
verb
- to place in an enclose area or chamber
= example: to place in an enclose area or chamber
